name: Santa and the Spider Queen
description:
Santa's has crashed throwing him into a cave.  Santa must obtain all the presents and escape the cave to save Christmas!

WASD or the analog stick on a controller to move.

K, Space or the A button on controller to jump

J or X button on controller to throw snowball.

escape to quit.

This project was started on 11/04/2019 with the goal of completing and posting it on 12/23/2019. Had quite a bit of fun creating this project. I learned alot and look forward to creating more in the future.
